explains: adj. 让人不安的，令人担忧的
v. 有关，关于；影响；使担心（concern 的现在分词形式）
wordGroup: concern oneself ◎从事,忙于(常与with, about, in, over连用) , ◎关心，关注，关切，挂念，担心，忧虑
of concern 重要的；具有意义
concern about 对…表示担心/忧虑；使（自己）关心…
concern oneself in adj. 干预；从事（参与；从事参与）；干涉
concern with v. 使关心，挂念
concern over 对…的关心／忧虑
primary concern 主要关心的事
going concern 继续经营企业
show one's concern for 对...表示关心或忧虑
of no concern 无关紧要，没有意义
issue of common concern 共同关心的问题

sentences.en: He asked several questions concerning the future of the company.
sentences.cn: 他问了几个有关公司前途的问题。

sentences.en: All cases concerning children are dealt with in a special children's court.
sentences.cn: 所有涉及儿童的案件均由儿童特别法庭审理。

sentences.en: His work is full of profundities and asides concerning the human condition.
sentences.cn: 他的作品充满了有关人类境况的深邃见解和话外音。
